org.onehippo.forge.utilities.hst.simpleocm.load

Interface FieldSetter

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Converter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BeanLoaderImpl, ConverterAdapter

    public interface FieldSetter
    Sets a value / object of a field based on a property / child node of a node.
    See Also:
    Converter, ConverterAdapter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setFieldValue(Object obj, Field field, javax.jcr.Node node, String relativePath)
      Sets the value of a field, by loading it from the property / child node specified by the relative path and a node.

    • Method Detail

      • setFieldValue

        void setFieldValue(Object obj,
                   Field field,
                   javax.jcr.Node node,
                   String relativePath)
            throws org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBindingException
        Sets the value of a field, by loading it from the property / child node specified by the relative path and a node.
        Parameters:
        obj - the object which corresponds to the field
        field - the field to set
        node - the node which provides the data.
        relativePath - the relative path
        Throws:
        org.hippoecm.hst.content.beans.ContentNodeBindingException - if setting the field fails
